content.text: Match ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 3, Real Madrid 4.
Second Half ends, Shakhtar Donetsk 3, Real Madrid 4.
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar Donetsk).
Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 3, Real Madrid 4. Alex Teixeira (Shakhtar Donetsk) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Taison.
Danilo (Real Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Danilo (Real Madrid).
Vasyl Kobin (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Ivan Ordets (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Goal!  Shakhtar Donetsk 2, Real Madrid 4. Dentinho (Shakhtar Donetsk) with an attempt from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Taras Stepanenko with a headed pass following a corner.

Taras Stepanenko (Shakhtar Donetsk) wins a free kick on the left wing.
